title: About Google pixel 5
content: As the Google pixel 5 is now launched so I ask again that iam willing to buy pixel 5 from canada and use it in India so will pixel5 receive 3 years of OS updates here in india too and will work on 4g network here as 5g is not available in india and will perform as good here in india too as it is intended to work in countries which has its availablity
